scripts.bootstrap: concurrently "cd hades && yarn" "cd artemis && yarn" "cd apollo && yarn"
scripts.dev: concurrently -k "cd artemis && yarn dev" "cd apollo && yarn dev"
scripts.dev:legacy: concurrently -k "cd artemis && yarn dev:legacy" "cd apollo && yarn dev"
scripts.postgres: docker run -e POSTGRES_USER=postgres -e POSTGRES_PASSWORD=postgres -e POSTGRES_DB=crm -dp 5432:5432 --name postgres postgres
